item.title: The Second One

item.title: This is my First Post
item.description: Hello World I want to create a list: Item 1 Item 2 Item 3 and some code as well: # Solve the quadratic equation ax**2 + bx + c = 0 # import complex math module import cmath a = 1 b = 5 c = 6 # calculate the discriminant d = (b**2) - (4*a*c) # find two solutions sol1 = (-b-cmath.sqrt(d))/(2*a) sol2 = (-b+cmath.sqrt(d))/(2*a) print('The solution are {0} and {1}'.
